00001 from node import Node
00002 from connection import Connection

00004 class Network(Node):
00005     def __init__(self):
00006         Node.__init__(self, -1)
00007         self.nodes = {}
00008         self.connections = {}
00009         self.index = 0
00010         self.tnodes = {}
00011         self.doprop = True
00012 
00013     def addNode(self, id=None, threshold=1.0):
00014         if not id:
00015             id = self.index
00016         if self.nodes.has_key(id):
00017             print self.nodes.keys()
00018             raise NodeDefinedError(id)
00019         self.nodes[id] = Node(id, self.doprop)
00020         if threshold:
00021             self.addThreshold(id, threshold)
00022         return id
00023 
00024     def setInput(self, vals):
00025         if len(vals) != len(self.outputs):
00026             raise InputSizeError
00027         for conn in self.outputs:
00028             conn.clear()
00029         for i in xrange(len(vals)):
00030             self.outputs[i].setValue(float(vals[i]))
00031         #self.outputs[len(vals)].setValue(1.0)
00032         for tnode in self.tnodes.values():
00033             tnode.setValue(1.0)
00034         
00035     def getOutput(self):
00036         vals = []
00037         for o in self.inputs:
00038             vals.append(o.getValue())
00039         return vals
00040 
00041     def onInput(self):
00042         pass
00043 
00044     def addConnection(self, src, dest, weight=1.0):
00045         n1 = self.nodes.get(src)
00046         n2 = self.nodes.get(dest)
00047         if n1 and n2:
00048             self.connections[(n1, n2)] = Connection(n1, n2, weight, self.doprop)
00049         else:
00050             raise ConnectionError(n1, n2)
00051 
00052     def removeConnection(self, src, dest):
00053         n1 = self.nodes.get(src)
00054         n2 = self.nodes.get(dest)
00055         conn = self.connections.pop((n1, n2))
00056         self.nodes[src].outputs.remove(conn)
00057         self.nodes[dest].inputs.remove(conn)
00058 
00059     def addThreshold(self, destid, threshold):
00060         tnode = Node("%s threshold"%str(destid), self.doprop)
00061         tnode.outval = 1.0
00062         self.tnodes[tnode.id] = tnode
00063         dest = self.nodes.get(destid)
00064         if tnode and dest:
00065             self.connections[(tnode, dest)] = Connection(tnode, dest, threshold)
00066             dest.threshold = self.connections[(tnode, dest)]
00067             dest.threshold.setValue(1.0)
00068         else:
00069             raise ConnectionError(tnode, dest)
00070 
00071     def changeThreshold(self, dest, threshold):
00072         if self.nodes[dest].threshold:
00073             self.nodes[dest].threshold.weight = threshold
00074         else:
00075             raise KeyError("Node doesn't have a threshold")
00076 
00077     def changeWeight(self, src, dest, weight):
00078         n1 = self.nodes.get(src)
00079         n2 = self.nodes.get(dest)
00080         if n1 and n2:
00081             conn = self.connections[(n1, n2)]
00082             if conn:
00083                 conn.changeWeight(weight)
00084             else:
00085                 raise ConnectionError(n1, n2)
00086         else:
00087             raise ConnectionError(n1, n2)
00088 
00089     def addInput(self, dest, weight=1.0):
00090         n2 = self.nodes.get(dest)
00091         if n2:
00092             self.connections[(self, n2)] = Connection(self, n2, weight)
00093         else:
00094             raise ConnectionError(self, n2)
00095 
00096     def addOutput(self, src, weight=1.0):
00097         n1 = self.nodes.get(src)
00098         if n1:
00099             self.connections[(n1, self)] = Connection(n1, self, weight)
00100         else:
00101             raise ConnectionError(n1, self)
00102 
00103     def test(self, pattern):
00104         right = 0
00105         wrong = 0
00106         kap = {}
00107         for p in pattern:
00108             input = p[0]
00109             #print input, "->", 
00110             self.setInput(input)
00111             output = self.getOutput()
00112             for i in xrange(len(output)):
00113                 if output[i] >= 0.5:
00114                     output[i] = 1
00115                 else:
00116                     output[i] = 0
00117             #print output
00118             if p[1] == output:
00119                 right += 1
00120             else:
00121                 wrong += 1
00122             lt = tuple(p[1])
00123             rt = tuple(output)
00124             if not kap.has_key(lt):
00125                 kap[lt] = {}
00126             if not kap[lt].has_key(rt):
00127                 kap[lt][rt] = 0
00128             kap[lt][rt] += 1
00129         return right, wrong, kap

00138 class NodeDefinedError(Exception):
00139     def __init__(self, value):
00140         self.value = value
00141         print "Undefined Node: ", value
00142     def __str__(self):
00143         return repr(self.value)
00144 
00145 class InputSizeError(Exception):
00146     def __init__(self):
00147         print "Input size doesn't match number of network inputs"
00148 
00149 class ConnectionError(Exception):
00150     def __init__(self, n1, n2):
00151         self.n1 = n1
00152         self.n2 = n2
00153         print "Cannot make a connection: %s %s"%(str(n1),str(n2))
00154     def __str__(self):
00155         return repr(self.n1) + ' ' + repr(self.n2)
